mutation {
	updateDataproduct(
		id: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
		input: {
			name: "Updated Name"
			description: "Updated description"
            teamContact: "#team"
            productAreaID: "Mocked-001"
            teamID: "nada-001"
            teamkatalogenURL: "nada"
		}
	) {
		name
	}
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "updateDataproduct": {
      "name": "Updated Name"
    }
  }
}
